author: craigmcc
msg: Update JSP pages used to produce XML output to use <c:out> for its sensitive
character escaping capabilities, to ensure that we don't create invalid XML
if the data being emitted happens to include characters like "<" or "'" but
does not render balanced XML itself.
Thanks to Jason Lea <jason AT kumachan.net.nz> on the Struts User mailing

author: ggregory
msg: Normalize @author and @version tag order and add missing @version tags.

author: djencks
msg: upgrade to private wsdl4j version.  Fix one way operations. copy some handling from AxisServlet.  See also AXIS-1971
